title: Maven Build fails if DB Configuration is missing in default file or test
body:
### Describe the bug

if DB Configuration is  missing from  default properties or test.properties. Most of application run build with mocking db connection and missing DB details should not cause build fail. 

### Expected behavior

build should be successful

### Actual behavior

Build is Failed 

### How to Reproduce?

Create project from start coding at quarkus.com
add hibernate, rest and postgress dependency. 
Remove docker and native test
run mvn clean package
